column2: DouYu International Holdings Ltd. develops and operates game-centric live streaming platform in China, both on personal computer and mobile apps. The company is headquartered in Wuhan, Hubei and currently employs 2,080 full-time employees. The firm operates its platform on Personal Computer (PC) and mobile apps, through which users can enjoy immersive and interactive gaming and entertainment live streaming. The firm operates through two segments: Live Streaming segment as well as Advertisement and others segments. The firm mainly operates its businesses in the domestic market.
